Apprentice Atra:
You can choose an item of your choice if you have enough Mucrokian Hides or Contaminated Mucrokian Hides.
Contaminated Mucrokian Hide are worth more and count as much as double of a normal Mucrokian Hide. In fact, we tend to favor those more and they will be deducted first those first before accepting normal Mucrokian Hides.
What would you like?
Recipe - Sealed Dynasty Earring(70%)(Requires 192 Mucrokian Hides)
Recipe - Sealed Dynasty Necklace(70%)(Requires 256 Mucrokian Hides)
Recipe - Sealed Dynasty Ring(70%)(Requires 128 Mucrokian Hides)
Recipe - Sealed Dynasty Sigil(60%)(Requires 206 Mucrokian Hides)
Receive Moirai Robe Set or accessory recipe (Requires 180 Mucrokian Hides)
Receive Moirai Robe Set ingredient item (requires 100 Mucrokian skins).
